meanings: (친해지다) get[become] close (to), make friends with, become intimate friends (with)

vlive.korean: 더 가까워진 거 같아요 - 그런가요? I think we got much closer. - Is that so? 듣기 View video OSEN : PENTAGON 펜타곤, 여동생에 소개시켜주고 싶은 멤버? #스타로드 04
vlive.english: I think we got much closer. - Is that so?

vlive.korean: 가까워진 것 같아요 우리 조금? Do you think we've got closer? 듣기 View video OSEN : MAMAMOO 마마무의 선택은? 노래 vs 춤 #스타로드 06
vlive.english: Do you think we've got closer?

vlive.korean: [가까워진 거리만큼 두 사람의 마음도 가까워졌을까?] [Have they felt closer as they are seated closer?] View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나를 좋아해주는 사람에게 마음이 움직일까? #고백하기_좋은_순간ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP11
vlive.english: [Have they felt closer as they are seated closer?]

vlive.korean: [극락도 훨씬 더 가까워진 것 같아요] 가까이 대는 거 좋아하잖아요 그렇죠? [the heaven seem so close now] put our face close to the camera, right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [WJSN] 떨뚜와 함께라면 쑥마늘로 삼시한끼두끼귀여운세끼네끼오끼 가능!!(๑❛ڡ❛๑)💖 (SEOLA&SOOBIN talking about their duet)
vlive.english: [the heaven seem so close now] put our face close to the camera, right?

vlive.korean: [조금은 가까워진 거리] 됐어? [They've gotten a bit closer] Is it good? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 서공예❤️한림예고 남녀 썸 모음.zipㅣ[리얼하이로맨스(Real High School Romance)] 선공개
vlive.english: [They've gotten a bit closer] Is it good?

examples.korean: It's a well-known fact that you and Psy are good friends. Have you become friends with many other celebrities since your debut? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 싸이의 좋은 친구로 알려져 있는데, 데뷔 이후 가까워진 유명인 친구 있어요? TIMES CORE
examples.english: It's a well-known fact that you and Psy are good friends. Have you become friends with many other celebrities since your debut? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Korea also opened the door to produce LEU, coming one step closer to its pursuit of a stable supply of nuclear fuel. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 한국은 또한 저농축 우라늄 생산의 문을 열었는데 이는 한국이 핵 연료의 안정된 공급을 추진하는데 있어서 한걸음 더 가까워진 것이다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Korea also opened the door to produce LEU, coming one step closer to its pursuit of a stable supply of nuclear fuel. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: With President Roh Moo-hyun's appointment of two women rights activists as his ministers, the abolishment of the hoju-je seems closer than ever. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 노무현 대통령이 단행한 두 명의 여성운동가의 내각 임명으로, 호주제 폐지가 여느 때보다 가까워진 것으로 보인다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: With President Roh Moo-hyun's appointment of two women rights activists as his ministers, the abolishment of the hoju-je seems closer than ever. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Just how did it become too much too soon? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정말 어떻게 그게 그렇게 많아지고 시일이 가까워 진거요? User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 알파리듬(2b_a****)
examples.english: Just how did it become too much too soon? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I think it is more likely than not to be closer to the target. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아마도 목표에 더 가까워진 것 같다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 장형우(sspe****) Hansard
examples.english: I think it is more likely than not to be closer to the target. Add to Wordbook
